meanings.sent1: The holo cake was big and complete.
meanings.sent2: She felt holo after finishing her homework.
meanings.sent3: The holo family gathered for a picnic in the park.
meanings.sent4: His holo heart was filled with joy.
meanings.sent5: The holo sky stretched endlessly above them.

meanings.definition: A prefix meaning whole or complete
meanings.sent1: Adding holo- to the word made it mean complete.
meanings.sent2: The holo- in holistic means whole.
meanings.sent3: The chef used holo- to describe the dish as a whole meal.
meanings.sent4: The holo- in holoistic represents entirety.
meanings.sent5: The holo- in holoquial denotes completeness.

meanings.sent1: The holo of a butterfly floated in the air.
meanings.sent2: He was amazed by the holo of a dragon in the museum.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to catch the holo of a mouse on the wall.
meanings.sent4: The holo of a star shimmered in the dark room.
meanings.sent5: The holo of a flower looked so real.
